Functions

cipher(text, shift, encrypt=True)

This function can shift letter by a defined units in a text.
cipher__yl4825.cipher__yl4825.cipher(text, shift, encrypt=True)

This function can shift letter by a defined units in a text.

Parameters

  • text (str) – A string of text.

  • shift (int) – Units of how the letter is shifted to the left(-) or right(+).

  • encrypt (bool) – Default is True for encryption.

Returns

The encrypted or decrypted string.

Return type

str

Examples

>>> cipher("hi", 1)
'ij'
